[tags]: 
How can I improve my ARIMA forecast in R?

I obtained the ARIMA forcast below from the following code: ARIMAfit = auto.arima((data.ts), seasonal = TRUE) plot(residuals(ARIMAfit)) plot(forecast(ARIMAfit, h = 200)) where data.ts is a ts object with frequency 7 in R. The data set is the daily usage of bicycles in a bike-share program. As you can imagine, I want a better forecast of what would happen. Do you have any suggestions on how to improve my forecast? The data passes both the DF and DW tests after I apply the auto.arima. I appreciate your help. Data: Time Series: Start = c(1, 1) End = c(9, 10) Frequency = 60 197 284 471 446 436 415 995 713 819 1582 1828 2162 3159 2714 1854 1254 1497 1123 1809 2993 474 922 1115 797 293 1656 1449 2076 2192
